A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This does not feel like the original trilogy\, but let's face it: the possibility for that magic to be instilled in new films is slim.  The movie is long\, with so many subplots it'll make you dizzy.  However\, the movie is amusing.  Though it doesn't feel like the Star Wars we grew up with\, the film in itself is entertaining. I wish there wasn't so much going on. We wanted this movie for Luke. Instead we have new characters introduced that we care nothing for\, many plots that seem like fluff\, and a main plot that doesn't progress until the last 30 minutes. An entertaining movie. Much more comedy than you'll be used to based on the original trilogy\, but thankfully nowhere near as bad as the prequel trilogy.
